issue.title: [CF 299] Icon alpha condition
issue.body:
Make a condition to check the exact alpha level of other icons, instead of just hidden/shown.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras | Imported from CurseForge issue #299 | Raw

comments.body:
Actually, that is rather pointless (I think). If anyone has any ideas for a usage of this, hit me up.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
